sourcesContent:
import { Form, Button, Row, Col, fieldset} from 'react-bootstrap';
import {useContext, useState} from 'react'

const UserForm = () => {
    const [firstName, setFirstName]=useState('')
    const [lastName, setLastName]=useState('')
    const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date())
    const [browser, setBrowser] = useState('')
    const [os, setOS] = useState('')
    const [amount, setAmount]=useState(0)

    return (
        <Form className="mx-auto" style={{width: "680px"}}>
            <Row className="mb-3">
                <Form.Group as={Col}>
                    <Form.Label>First Name</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control 
                        type="text"
                        placeholder="Enter your First Name"
                        value={firstName} 
                        onChange={(e)=>setFirstName(e.target.value)}
                        />
                </Form.Group>
                <Form.Group as={Col}>
                    <Form.Label>Last Name</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control 
                        type="text"
                        placeholder="Enter your Last Name"
                        value={lastName} 
                        onChange={(e)=>setLastName(e.target.value)}
                        />
                </Form.Group>
            </Row>
            <Row>
                <Form.Group className="mb-3">
                    <Form.Label>Bug Discover Date:</Form.Label>
                    <Form.Control  
                        type="date"
                        value={date} 
                        onChange={(e)=>setDate(e.target.value)}
                    />
                </Form.Group>
            </Row>

            <fieldset>
                <Form.Group as={Row} className="mb-3">
                    <Form.Label>
                        Brower
                    </Form.Label>

                    <Col>
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Google Chrome"
                            value="Google Chrome"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Internet Exploer"
                            value="Internet Exploer"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Safari"
                            value="Safari"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />  
                    </Col>
                    <Col>
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Firefox"
                            value="Firefox"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Microsoft Edge"
                            value="Microsoft Edge"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Opera"
                            value="Opera"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />
                    </Col>
                </Form.Group>
            </fieldset>
            <fieldset>
                <Form.Group as={Row} className="mb-3">
                    <Form.Label>
                        Operating System
                    </Form.Label>

                    <Col>
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Window 11"
                            value="Window 11"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setOS(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Window 10"
                            value="Window 10"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setOS(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Window 7"
                            value="Window 7"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setOS(e.target.value)}
                        />  
                    </Col>
                    <Col>
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Mac Os X"
                            value="Mac Os X"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setOS(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Microsoft Edge"
                            value="Microsoft Edge"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setOS(e.target.value)}
                        />
                        <Form.Check
                            type="radio"
                            label="Opera"
                            value="Opera"
                            name="formHorizontalRadios"
                            onChange={(e)=>setBrowser(e.target.value)}
                        />
                    </Col>
                </Form.Group>
            </fieldset>

            <Form.Group className="mb-3" controlId="formBasicCheckbox">
                <Form.Check type="checkbox" label="Check me out" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Button variant="primary" type="submit">
                Submit
            </Button>
        </Form>
    )
}

export default UserForm
